input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product name.

Product name:
Amzer 10.5-Inch Designer Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch for Tablet, eBook and Netbook - Coffee Break (AMZ5008105)

Product keywords:
Constructed of shock-absorbing & weather resistant neoprene material.
Secure your tablet or e-reader up to 10.5 inches.
Non-abrasive material lines interior securing your device for safe travel and storage.
Slim and lightweight design provides low-profile protection against everyday wear and tear.
Stylish exterior graphic.
Dual zippers makes accessing your device quick and easy.
External Dimensions: 11.125 x 8.5. Internal Dimensions: 10.5 x 8.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Amzer's 10.5-Inch Designer Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch for Tablet, eBook and Netbook provides a simple way to protect your valuable device while carrying it in your briefcase, purse, or backpack. Featuring a stylish and colorful exterior, this durable neoprene sleeve is designed to protect your device against scratches, bumps, and drops. The interior of the case features a soft and non-abrasive material that helps prevent scratches on your device.

Dual zippers make it easy to access your device, while the slim and lightweight design allows you to carry your device without adding any unnecessary bulk. The exterior graphic adds to the look and feel of this case.
input_text.Response B: Coffee Break Amzer's Universal Tablet/eBook/Netbook Neoprene Sleeve Case Pouch is a must have accessory for your tablet. This slim and lightweight design provides low-profile protection against everyday wear and tear while adding a touch of style to your tablet. The exterior graphic is sure to catch the eye of anyone behind you when you're out and about. The dual zippers make accessing your device quick and easy, while the non-abrasive material lines the interior securing your device for safe travel and storage. This case is constructed of shock-absorbing and weather resistant neoprene material.
